meanings.definition: To remove a hat from one's head.
meanings.sent1: He unhatted himself before entering the building.
meanings.sent2: She quickly unhatted as she stepped indoors.
meanings.sent3: The magician unhatted himself to reveal a dove underneath.
meanings.sent4: The knight unhatted, revealing his noble face.
meanings.sent5: With a flourish, he unhatted and bowed deeply.

meanings.sent1: The unhatted man felt the sun on his head.
meanings.sent2: She preferred to be unhatted on sunny days.
meanings.sent3: The unhatted detective solved the case with ease.
meanings.sent4: The unhatted cowboy rode off into the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The unhatted child ran through the fields, feeling free.
